H0.text: When free school milk was given out what size were the bottles. Half a liter

H1.text: When free school milk was given out what size were the bottles. Quarter of a quart

H2.text: When free school milk was given out what size were the bottles. 200 milliliters

H3.text: When free school milk was given out what size were the bottles. Third of a pint

A4.text: milk was distributed at morning recess in 1/3 pint bottles
